sentences.en: A third of the territory was ceded to France.
sentences.cn: 领土的三分之一割让给了法国.

sentences.en: Although officially a dependent territory the island is effectively autonomous.
sentences.cn: 虽然正式说来这个岛是附属领土,但实际上是自治的.

sentences.en: Doing human rights work is risky business. That comes with the territory.
sentences.cn: 做人权工作是要冒风险的。这是难免的。

sentences.en: Georgia refuses to give up any territory.
sentences.cn: 格鲁吉亚拒绝出让任何领土。

sentences.en: Hong Kong is a Chinese territory.
In 1990, 200,000 Soviet Jews resettled on Israeli territory.
sentences.cn: 在1990年，20万名苏联犹太人在以色列重新定居。

sentences.en: Israel captured the territory in the 1967 War.
sentences.cn: 在1967年的战争中，以色列占领了这块领土。

sentences.en: On May 1st the army took over another swathe of territory.
sentences.cn: 军队在5月1号又接管了另一长条领土。

sentences.en: Resources in plenty can be found in this territory.
sentences.cn: 这一地区能找到大量自然资源.

sentences.en: The agree-ment gives the territory limited self-rule.
sentences.cn: 这个协议规定该地区享有有限的自治权。

sentences.en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
sentences.cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

sentences.en: The company is moving into unfamiliar territory with this new software.
sentences.cn: 该公司正通过这种新软件进入一个不熟悉的领域。

sentences.en: They penetrated into territory where no man had ever gone before.
sentences.cn: 他们已进入先前没人去过的地区.

sentences.en: They were now deep inside rebel territory.
sentences.cn: 他们现在已深入叛军占领区。

sentences.en: This is my territory. I want you out of here.
sentences.cn: 这是我的地盘。我要你离开。

sentences.en: We are prepared to fight for every inch of territory.
sentences.cn: 我们时刻准备着为每一寸领土而战。

sentences.en: You may have free passage across our territory whenever you require it.
sentences.cn: 无论你什么时候需要，都可以自由穿过我们的领地。

words.tran_cn: 领土的；区域的；土地的；地方的
领土性质或状态；领土权
按地区分配；使成为领土

phrases.tran_cn: 是免不了的，是意料中的
印第安准州；印第安人保留区
北领地，北部领地；北部地方
联合国托管地，托管领土
育空地区；育空领地（加拿大北部的一个行政区）

trans.tran_en: land that is owned or controlled by a particular country, ruler, or military force
